Cluster_Summary: Activities related to sustainable forest management, including forest inventory, harvesting plans, certification, and community involvement.

Cluster_Name: Conserving the region in Amazonas state
Cluster_Summary: Activities focused on conserving the region in Amazonas state

Creating effective communication and dissemination channels, providing access to information about REDD+, and raising awareness among stakeholders. Includes promoting transparency, community participation, and gender and community inclusion.

Providing training and necessary equipment to rangers to maintain control over the project area and enforce the law, reducing pastoralists' entry, human encroachment, poaching, and illegal timber collection.
Support pilot initiatives by surrounding communities to reduce the expansion of agrarian activities and improve livelihood conditions.
Monitor sectors with a risk of invasion using satellite monitoring and field assessments.
Engagement with local communities and stakeholders to increase awareness about the project and its objectives. Development of a visitor center to educate visitors about the project.
Engaging with local communities to identify causes of deforestation and raise awareness about the project

Cluster_Name: Implementation of sustainable Income Generating Activities (IGAs)
Cluster_Summary: Implementing IGAs to provide livelihood benefits for local communities, diversify the local economy, and decrease dependence on agriculture. IGAs include bee-keeping, agricultural activities (such as sesame, soya farming, and organic cotton production), and financing of microprojects.

Cluster_Name: Participate in dialogue spaces and management of Protected Areas
Cluster_Summary: Engaging in dialogue spaces and contributing to the management of Protected Areas, including the Territorial Reserve Madre de Dios.
Developing economic alternatives compatible with community well-being and nature conservation.
Strengthen land use planning and mechanisms to guarantee food security for the communities.
Measurement of net estimated emission removals and reductions in the project area, estimated forest loss reduction, and other metrics related to GHG emissions and forest cover.

Cluster_Name: Partnering with education and research institutions
Cluster_Summary: Collaborating with educational and research institutions to support project goals
Activities aimed at improving living conditions and providing support for social development.

Cluster_Name: Forego Selling of Property, Then Clearing and Conversion of the Project Areas
Cluster_Summary: Negotiation with landowners to prevent clearing and conversion of the project areas to non-forest land.
Provision of motor boat for community transportation

Promoting multiple environmental assets for smallholder farmers in the watershed area, such as improved carbon sequestration, sustainable water management, and livelihoods. Activities include implementing SALM practices such as residue/nutrient management, agronomic practices, and agroforestry.
